str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
From chairo; graciousness, of manner or act.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A gift, present. A present; specially, a sacrifice.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
